column4: so what about my problem: I can't see folder I shared on my windows pc nor other way around..
I can see both computers on either of the networks but when I click xubuntu in windows it just emty and when I click windows pc in xubuntu it can't access it...
is samba installed properly did you try ubuntu to ubuntu via samba
if you no ubuntu pc's IP try running this command on RUN "//IPadrress/folderlocation/"
